info.abstract: The Pivot component mimics the Excel pivot function to allow users to aggregate and transform data.
info.description: This component allows you to aggregate and transform data. The functionality that it provides is very similiar to the one used in Excel.

ul.li: tab-delimited file: contains data to be modified.
Aggregation Method: functions to be used in aggregation, e.g., count, sum, min, max, sd and median
Rows in Pivot Table: rows that would appear as rows in the pivot result table. Multiple selection is allowed.
Measurement: the original columns that would be used for measurement of pivoting. Multiple selection is allowed.
More Factors: yes or no. Selecting yes will make the next option, Columns in Pivot Table, appear.
Columns in Pivot Table: the columns to be included in the pivot result table. This provides more specific measurement for the subgroups of the chosen columns. Multiple selection is allowed.
